homePage.title: Home

homePage.applyTooltipLimits: Your grant limits have been reached.
homePage.welcomeSubtitle: Fast, secure, and compassionate financial assistance when you need it most.
homePage.defaultDescription: E4E Relief provides grants to employees experiencing hardships. Please verify your fund code to see specific program details.

DOM.title: Blastoise Relief Fund
DOM.subtitle: Weathering the storm, together.
DOM.description: The Blastoise Relief Fund is dedicated to helping our community recover from severe water-related disasters and structural damage. We provide rapid financial assistance to help you rebuild and recover.

ROST.title: Charizard Relief Fund
ROST.subtitle: Rising from the ashes.
ROST.description: When heat and fire threaten our homes, the Charizard Relief Fund steps in. We offer immediate support for wildfire recovery and other critical emergencies to help you get back on your feet.

SSO.title: Venusaur Relief Fund
SSO.subtitle: Cultivating stability and growth.
SSO.description: The Venusaur Relief Fund supports employees facing natural hardships and life challenges. From ground stability issues to personal well-being, we are here to help you grow through adversity.

chatbotWidget.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

terms.title: Terms of Acceptance
body: By submitting this application, I certify that the information provided is true, correct, and complete to the best of my knowledge. I understand that any false statements, misrepresentations, or omissions may lead to the denial of my application or other disciplinary action, up to and including termination of employment, where applicable.

I authorize E4E Relief and its agents to verify the information provided in this application. I understand that this assistance is intended to provide temporary relief for qualified disaster events and may not cover all of my expenses.

I agree to release and hold harmless E4E Relief, my employer, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from any and all claims, liabilities, or causes of action arising out of or related to this application and any assistance provided.

I understand that the funds are granted based on the information provided and are subject to availability. Receiving an award does not guarantee future assistance. All decisions made by E4E Relief are final.

formControls.addressHelper: Type or paste a full address below and let our AI fill in the fields for you.

formControls.aiParseError: Could not extract details. Please try again or fill fields manually.

applicantFaqs.question: How do I start a new application?
applicantFaqs.answer: You can start a new application from the Home screen by tapping either 'Apply' for the standard form, or 'AI Apply' for a conversational experience. Both options are disabled if you are not eligible or have reached your grant limits.

applicantFaqs.question: What is the difference between 'Apply' and 'AI Apply'?
answer: The standard application is a multi-step form that you fill out manually. It is ideal if you prefer a traditional form-filling experience.
AI Apply is a conversational experience where an AI assistant asks you questions one-by-one to complete your application. It is ideal if you prefer a more guided, interactive process.

applicantFaqs.question: How do I know if I'm eligible to apply?
applicantFaqs.answer: Your eligibility status is shown on your Profile page and in the header. If your status is 'Eligible', you can apply. If it shows 'Verification Needed', you must complete the verification process first. You can start this from the 'Fund Identities' section of your Profile.

applicantFaqs.question: Where can I see my grant limits?
applicantFaqs.answer: Your remaining 12-month and lifetime grant balances are displayed at the top of the 'My Applications' section on your Profile page.

applicantFaqs.question: I failed verification, what do I do now?
applicantFaqs.answer: If you fail verification after the maximum number of attempts, you will be placed in the Relief Queue. From there, you can contact support or correct your name and re-attempt verification with the correct fund code.

applicantFaqs.question: How will I receive my grant payment?
applicantFaqs.answer: Grant payments are disbursed through our payment partners. You can find detailed guides for both U.S. and international payment options on the 'Payments' page, accessible from the Support Center.

donorFaqs.question: Is my donation tax-deductible?
donorFaqs.answer: Yes, E4E Relief is a 501(c)(3) charitable organization. Your donation is tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law. You will receive an email receipt for your contribution.

donorFaqs.question: How does E4E Relief use my donation?
donorFaqs.answer: 100% of your donation goes directly to funding grants for employees in need. Your contribution provides critical financial assistance to individuals affected by unforeseen disasters and hardships.

donorFaqs.question: Can I donate to a specific fund or employee?
donorFaqs.answer: To ensure fairness and privacy, all donations go into a general relief fund that supports employees across all our partner programs. We cannot direct donations to specific individuals or funds.

donorFaqs.question: What other ways can I give?
donorFaqs.answer: For information about other ways to give, such as planned giving or corporate partnerships, please contact E4E Relief Donor Services at (704) 973-4564 or <1>donorservices@e4erelief.org</1>.

paymentOptionsPage.title: Payment Options
paymentOptionsPage.description: Grants are disbursed through our payment partners. Below you will find information for both U.S. and International applicants.
paymentOptionsPage.usApplicantsBody: U.S. grant payments are made through Bank of America Recipient Select. You will receive an email from Bank of America with instructions on how to choose your payment method (Zelle, ACH, or check).
paymentOptionsPage.usApplicantsLink: Learn More at Bank of America
paymentOptionsPage.intlSupportBody: For support with international payments, please contact support@e4erelief.example.
